data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Atlas in the half of Guadalajara.
Guadalajara needs to be cautious. Atlas have an attacking throw-in.
In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 11, Atlas have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Guadalajara are pushing forward but Isaac Brizuela's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 15, Atlas have a goal kick.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Akron.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Miguel Ponce for Guadalajara drives towards goal at Estadio Akron. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Guadalajara to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
In the minute 23, Guadalajara are coming forward and Jose Macias gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Free kick Guadalajara.
In the minute 24, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Guadalajara's Isaac Brizuela misses with an attempt on goal.
Fernando Guerrero awards Atlas a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 34, Atlas have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In Zapopan Atlas attack through Jesus Angulo. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Zapopan.
In the minute 36, Goal! Guadalajara have got their heads in front thanks to a Uriel Antuna strike.
Jesus Angulo with an assist there.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 39, Fernando Guerrero awards Atlas a goal kick.
In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 41, Goal! Jose Macias extends Guadalajara's lead to 2-0.
Great play from Uriel Antuna to set up the goal.
Fernando Guerrero signals a throw-in for Atlas, close to Guadalajara's area.
In the minute 44, Atlas's Javier Correa breaks free at Estadio Akron. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Can Atlas capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Guadalajara's half?
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 46, It's a goal kick for the home team in Zapopan.
Ignacio Jeraldino is replacing Luciano Acosta for the away team.
Atlas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
In the minute 49, Atlas have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Atlas have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
Throw-in Guadalajara.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Uriel Antuna.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of Atlas.
At Estadio Akron, Anderson Santamaria has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Uriel Antuna for Guadalajara is back on the field again.
Fernando Guerrero waits before resuming play because Alexis Vega for Guadalajara is still down.
In the minute 57, Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Guadalajara's Alexis Vega is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 59, Ignacio Jeraldino for Atlas gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Atlas.
The away team have replaced Jose Abella with Diego Barbosa. This is the second substitution made today by Diego Cocca.
In the minute 60, Ignacio Jeraldino of Atlas gets in a strike, but is off target.
Fernando Guerrero awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Zapopan.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Guadalajara's Jesus Angulo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Atlas have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Zapopan.
Edyairth Ortega is on a sub for Lorenzo Reyes for Atlas.
In the minute 69, Atlas make their fourth substitution with Jairo Torres replacing Renato Ibarra.
It seems as if Alexis Vega is unable to continue. Dieter Villalpando replaces him for the home team.
Atlas have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 72, Atlas were awarded a penalty ... Which Ignacio Malcorra failed to convert!
Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guadalajara's half?
Throw-in for Atlas close to the penalty box.
In the minute 74, Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team replace Jesus Sanchez with Gilberto Sepulveda Lopez.
The home team replace Jesus Angulo with Fernando Beltran.
In the minute 76, Free kick Guadalajara.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Akron.
Fernando Guerrero awards Atlas a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of Atlas.
Free kick in a good position for Guadalajara!
In the minute 82, Atlas make their fifth substitution with Jonathan Herrera replacing Javier Correa.
Eduardo Lopez is replacing Jose Macias for the home team.
Victor Vucetich (Guadalajara) is making a fifth substitution, with Angel Zaldivar replacing Uriel Antuna.
In the minute 84, Fernando Guerrero awards Atlas a goal kick.
Great finish from Isaac Brizuela to give Guadalajara a 3-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Dieter Villalpando.
In the minute 87, Throw-in high up the field for Atlas in Zapopan.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 3-1 through a strike by Ignacio Jeraldino. .
Hiram Mier (Guadalajara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Zapopan.
Fernando Guerrero awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Guadalajara.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Atlas.
Full-time! The final score is 3-2.
Guadalajara's Antonio Briseno has been booked in Zapopan.
Goal! Atlas now trail just 3-2 thanks to a Ignacio Malcorra spot-kick.
